'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Great sword}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

##  Trivia 

* Wielded by the Rathun and cannot be obtained in-game, other than through console commands.
* This weapon is listed as a sword and is one-handed, but has the description and all the stats of a [Superb Great Sword](/superbGreatSwordDeadfire/), including the weapon proficiency modal [Savage Attack](/savageAttackDeadfire/).
